name: Fav&Co
overview:
In the hopes of bringing together the obsessively compulsive researchers/buyers/collectors/purveyors of all things fine/fantastic/fabulous, we’ve created Fav&Co. You don’t have to do anything special to join, just sign in with your Facebook account. Once signed in, you’re likely to stumble across a product or two that might catch your fancy, learn something interesting about your friends, or stumble upon some new tastemakers worth following.

Fav&Co is all about insightful, well-written product reviews by real people, much like you and me. This may include your friends from Facebook, featured reviewers, trusted bloggers, perhaps even a celebrity or two. Product reviews span a wide range of lifestyles and product categories, where craftsmanship meets perfection, pragmatism meets beauty, all in one centralized easy-to-browse place.

Ever find yourself surfing the interwebs, sifting through countless Google images, mind-numbing product reviews, and less-than-relevant shopping engines for the absolute perfect whatever-it-may-be? It can take weeks, months, or sometimes even years to find that perfect thing. Chances are, someone else has already done a lot of the legwork for you. Better yet, they’re probably in your trusted social circle, or a few degrees of separation away from an intensely satisfying OMG-I-found-it moment.
